page.title: 09A DAY AT THE SEASIDE
page.content: One day I went to the seaside for a birthday treat. We went to Scarborough. We set off. We made some sandwiches to eat on the way we had some coffee, tea and pop to drink. Soon we came to a field with tables and benches in it so we stopped and had something to eat and drink. Soon we set off again in about an hour we were there. We got out of the car and went to the swimming baths. I could not swim so I got an air ring. We had an hour in the swimming baths and then we went to the fair. I went on the big wheel and then we went on the beach to play in the sand and in the sea. Later I went to the remote control boats and put ten pence in it and started it up. Soon it was time to go home. When I got home I watched the television and then I went to bed.
